DOC.brief_title: Biliary Drainage Patients With Duodenal Metal Stent
DOC.detailed_description: This multinational multicenter retrospective cohort study evaluate outcome endoscopic biliary drainage patient duodenal SEMS . Endoscopic ultrasound-guided biliary drainage ( EUS-BD ) , include choledochoduodenostomy , hepaticogastrostomy , antegrade biliary stenting combination , endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography ( ERCP ) stenting compare . Specifically , outcomes evaluate accord time distal MBO relation GOO location GOO .
DOC.criteria: Patients underwent endoscopic placement duodenal SEMS nonresectable malignant GOO . Patients underwent endoscopic biliary drainage nonresectable MBO . MBO locate ≥ 2 cm bifurcation . Patients could follow three month completion biliary drainage duodenal SEMS placement . Age ≥20 year . Irrespective sex primary disease . Patients underwent surgical bypass GOO . Patients underwent percutaneous surgical biliary drainage prior placement duodenal SEMS . Patients alter gastrointestinal anatomy ( BillrothII reconstruction , RouxenY reconstruction , etc. ) . Patients would give consent report data . Patients consider ineligible inclusion study investigator reason .
